body.p:
Louisville January 22nd 1863
Jas. W. Tate Asst Sec
Dear Sir
Your letter of 21st ult reached me this morning.

I spoke to Senator Speed to have me reappointed Notary-Public and have my appointment confirmed by the senate. But as I understand from your letter that you will attend to it if I enclose you the fee of One Dollar:-I hereby enclose the said amt and hope you will forward me the said appointment as won as convenient.

Most Respectfully Yours
Charles P. Rudd
